00049     PagingLandScapeCamera::PagingLandScapeCamera(const String& name, SceneManager* sm) : 
00050         PagingLandScapeOctreeCamera(name, sm),
00051 
00052         mCurrentCameraPageX(0), 
00053         mCurrentCameraPageZ(0),
00054         mCurrentCameraTileX(0), 
00055         mCurrentCameraTileZ(0),
00056         mIniX(0),
00057         mFinX(0),
00058                 mIniZ(0),
00059         mFinZ(0),
00060         mPreIniX(0),
00061         mPreFinX(0),
00062         mPreIniZ(0),
00063         mPreFinZ(0),
00064             mLastCameraPos (Vector3(std::numeric_limits<Real>::max (), 
00065                                 0.0f, 
00066                                 std::numeric_limits<Real>::max ()))
00067     {
00068         // initialized after the Camera::Camera().
00069         mLastViewport = 0;
00070     }

00076     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00077     void PagingLandScapeCamera::resetPaging()
00078     {
00079         mCurrentCameraPageX = 0; 
00080         mCurrentCameraPageZ = 0;
00081         mCurrentCameraTileX = 0; 
00082         mCurrentCameraTileZ = 0;
00083         mIniX = 0;
00084         mFinX = 0;
00085                 mIniZ = 0;
00086         mFinZ = 0;
00087         mPreIniX = 0;
00088         mPreFinX = 0;
00089         mPreIniZ = 0;
00090         mPreFinZ = 0;
00091         mLastCameraPos = Vector3 (std::numeric_limits<Real>::min (), 
00092                                   0.0f, 
00093                                   std::numeric_limits<Real>::min ());
00094         updatePaging (0, 0);
00095 //        Real dist = Camera::getDerivedPosition().squaredLength()
00096 //            + mParent->getOptions()->cameraThreshold
00097 //        mLastCameraPos.x = dist;
00098 //        mLastCameraPos.y = dist;
00099 //        mLastCameraPos.z = dist;
00100     }
00101     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00102     void PagingLandScapeCamera::updatePaging (const unsigned int x, const unsigned int z)
00103     {
00104         // We must load the next visible LandScape pages, 
00105         // check the LandScape boundaries       
00106 
00107         mCurrentCameraPageX = x;
00108         mCurrentCameraPageZ = z;
00109         const PagingLandScapeOptions * const opt = 
00110             static_cast <PagingLandScapeSceneManager*> (mSceneMgr)->getOptions ();
00111         const unsigned int w = opt->world_width;
00112         const unsigned int h = opt->world_height;
00113         const unsigned int adjpages = opt->max_adjacent_pages;
00114         const unsigned int prepages = opt->max_preload_pages;
00115 
00116         // Load Windowing
00117         unsigned int lx = x;
00118         if (static_cast<int> (x - adjpages) >= 0)
00119         {
00120             mIniX = x - adjpages;
00121         }
00122         else
00123         {
00124             mIniX = 0;
00125             lx -= x - adjpages;
00126         }
00127         if (lx + adjpages < w)
00128         {
00129             mFinX = lx + adjpages;
00130         }
00131         else
00132         {
00133             mFinX = w - 1;
00134             mIniX = (static_cast <int> (mIniX + (w - (lx + adjpages))) > 0)? mIniX + (w - (lx + adjpages)):0;
00135         }
00136 
00137         unsigned int lz = z;
00138         if (static_cast<int> (z - adjpages) >= 0)
00139         {
00140             mIniZ = z - adjpages;
00141         }
00142         else
00143         {
00144             mIniZ = 0;
00145             lz -= z - adjpages;
00146         }
00147         if (lz + adjpages < h)
00148         {
00149             mFinZ = lz + adjpages;
00150         }
00151         else
00152         {
00153             mFinZ = h - 1;
00154             mIniZ = (static_cast <int> (mIniZ + (h - (lz + adjpages))) > 0)? mIniZ + (h - (lz + adjpages)):0;
00155         }
00156 
00157         // Pre-load Windowing
00158         lx = x;
00159         if (static_cast<int> (x - prepages) > 0)
00160         {
00161             mPreIniX = x - prepages;
00162         }
00163         else
00164         {
00165             mPreIniX = 0;
00166             lx -= x - prepages;
00167         }
00168         if (x + prepages < w)
00169         {
00170             mPreFinX = x + prepages;
00171         }
00172         else
00173         {
00174             mPreFinX = w - 1;
00175             mPreIniX = (static_cast <int> (mPreIniX + (w - (lx + prepages))) > 0)? mPreIniX + (w - (lx + prepages)):0;
00176         }
00177 
00178         lz = z;
00179         if (static_cast<int> (z - prepages) > 0)
00180         {
00181             mPreIniZ = z - prepages;
00182         }
00183         else
00184         {
00185             mPreIniZ = 0;
00186             lz -= z - prepages;
00187         }
00188         if (lz + prepages < h)
00189         {
00190             mPreFinZ = lz + prepages;
00191         }
00192         else
00193         {
00194             mPreFinZ = h - 1;
00195             mPreIniZ = (static_cast <int> (mPreIniZ + (h - (lz + prepages))) > 0)? mPreIniZ  + (h - (lz + prepages)):0;
00196         }
00197         //(static_cast <PagingLandScapeSceneManager*> (getSceneManager())->resize());
00198     }
00199     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00200     bool PagingLandScapeCamera::isVisible(const AxisAlignedBox &bound) const
00201     {
00202         // Null boxes always invisible
00203         if (bound.isNull())
00204             return false;
00205 
00206         // Make any pending updates to the calculated frustum
00207         Camera::updateView();
00208 
00209         // Get corners of the box
00210         const Vector3 * ogre_restrict const pCorners = bound.getAllCorners();
00211 
00212                 // For each plane, see if all points are on the negative side
00213                 // If so, object is not visible
00214         const bool infinite_far_clip = (mFarDist == 0);
00215         for (unsigned int plane = 0; plane < 6; ++plane)
00216         {
00217             // Skip far plane if infinite view frustum
00218             if (infinite_far_clip && plane == FRUSTUM_PLANE_FAR)
00219                 continue;
00220 
00221             const Plane * ogre_restrict const frustumPlane = &mFrustumPlanes[ plane ];
00222 
00223                         if (frustumPlane->getSide(pCorners[0]) == Plane::NEGATIVE_SIDE &&
00224                                 frustumPlane->getSide(pCorners[1]) == Plane::NEGATIVE_SIDE &&
00225                                 frustumPlane->getSide(pCorners[2]) == Plane::NEGATIVE_SIDE &&
00226                                 frustumPlane->getSide(pCorners[3]) == Plane::NEGATIVE_SIDE &&
00227                                 frustumPlane->getSide(pCorners[4]) == Plane::NEGATIVE_SIDE &&
00228                                 frustumPlane->getSide(pCorners[5]) == Plane::NEGATIVE_SIDE &&
00229                                 frustumPlane->getSide(pCorners[6]) == Plane::NEGATIVE_SIDE &&
00230                                 frustumPlane->getSide(pCorners[7]) == Plane::NEGATIVE_SIDE)
00231                         {
00232                                 return false;
00233                         }
00234         }
00235         return true;
00236     }
00237 }
